item.title: 2.4 The Monotone Convergence Theorem and a First Look at Infinite Series

attr.q:
(Calculating Square Roots). Let x_1 = 2, and define

x_{n+1} = \frac 1 2 \left(x_n + \frac 2 {x_n} \right)
